text.div:
Document Format Codes

Format codes - logical formats for documents (as opposed to mime types which are literal formats)

This value set defines its own terms in the system http://hl7.org/fhir/document-formats

CodeDisplayDefinition
textPlain text in some known character encoding
pdfPortable Printable Document (pdf, xps)
documentWord Document (.rtf, .doc, .docx, .odt)
spreadsheetSpreadsheet (.xls, .xlsx, .odt)
pixelspixel map image (.dicom, .bmp, .jpg, .png, .gif, etc)
drawingVector image (.svg, .eps, etc)
htmlHTML markup
signatureXML Digital Signature
cdaClinical Document (e.g. CDA or templated CDA, or Dicom Structured Report)
..ccdaConsolidated Clinical Document
ccrASTM CCR document
v2Archived HL7 v2 message

name: Document Format Codes
description: Format codes - logical formats for documents (as opposed to mime types which are literal formats)

concept.display: Plain text in some known character encoding
